original_title: Chrono Cross 20th Anniversary Live Tour 2019 Radical Dreamers Yasunori Mitsuda & Millennial Fair
overview: To commemorate the 20th anniversary of the release of "Chrono Cross," the PlayStation software sequel to "Chrono Trigger," which is still very popular today, Yasunori Mitsuda, the composer of the game, served as the general director of the Chrono Cross Live Tour, and this Blu-ray work includes the final performance of the tour held at Nakano Sunplaza on January 25, 2020.
title: Chrono Cross 20th Anniversary Live Tour 2019 Radical Dreamers Yasunori Mitsuda & Millennial Fair
